page.title: 19FAVOURITE BOOKS & MUSICIANS
page.content: Q.What are your 3 favourite{books}? {BOYS } { % 1.Adrian Mole (Sue Townsend)........ 5 2.The Hobbit (J R R Tolkien)........ 5 2.Oor Wullie Annual................. 5 {GIRLS % 1.Adrian Mole (Sue Townsend)........13 2.Are You There It's Me Margaret (Judy Blume).......... 5 -------------------------------------- Q.Who are your favourite 3{musicians}? {BOYS % 1.Frankie Goes To Hollywood.........12 2.Status Quo........................10 3.Iron Maiden....................... 9 {GIRLS % 1.Wham!.............................50 2.Paul Young........................27 3.Duran Duran.......................24 --------------------------------------
